algorithm_technique: Find the three largest and two smallest numbers in the array to determine the maximum product.
problem_summary_simple: Find three numbers in an array whose product is the largest possible.
problem_summary_technical: Tracks the three largest and two smallest numbers in a single pass to identify the two potential maximum product combinations.
key_insights: The maximum product can come from either the three largest positive numbers or the two smallest negative numbers multiplied by the largest positive number.
A single pass through the array is sufficient to find the required minimum and maximum values.
Careful initialization of min/max variables is important to handle edge cases and negative numbers.
